reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Linen doesn't have any stretch! size up.
reviews.reviewText: I keep getting overalls, becuase they are so comfortable. Usually I only buy cotton with spandex, but I took a chance on this after reading the measurements. it fit, but not with the required ease that a linen garment needs.The Pros: This is a beautiful, well made garment. The color is saturated and the fabric is great. the ties on the shoulder are adorable, and make it easy to put on and take off.The Cons: sizing. When you make a garment out of linen, the ease needs to be significantly larger than if it's a more flexible, stretchable material. There is no give in linen. So, if you're even close to the higher edge of the measurements, size up. If you're at the top end of the measurements, take a pass on this one.It's beautiful, but the disappointment isn't necessary.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Looks better on the model than on me
reviews.reviewText: I so badly wanted this to look cute on me, but it was too big for my small self. I gave it to my niece & it fit perfectly. I'm too short.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best romper/ onesie
reviews.reviewText: These are so comfortable. I have it in the teal color and black, colors as advertised. I had to keep myself from buying more colors. Very comfortable for summer, not too tight for summer. Goes great with a body suit underneath. I always get compliments when I wear it. It has been a cute/ casual staple for me to wear this summer and on trips. Straps are adjustable, you just tie and untie into knots in the front. Shorts part of the item are a great length, not too long or too short. No weird sagging in the crotch. Love this item, have sent the link for multiple friends that loved it on me as well. Washing- I usually use a delicate cycle and hang dry just to be safe and prevent shrinking and so far that has worked well for multiple washes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Very cute but too small
reviews.reviewText: I wear a large. I’m 5’ 3” and weigh 162 lbs. Amazon suggested a large based on past purchases but I definitely need an XL. I can wear it but if I wear anything more than a sports bra under it it’ll be snug. It is also a little short in the midsection but hopefully an XL will change that too. Other than that it’s cute and looks like it’ll be comfy. I’m going to return this one and purchase an XL and I’ll be happy.I got the XL one and it fit fine. I accidentally threw it in the dryer though so now it’s shrunk up horribly. So, now I won’t be able to wear it unless I drop some serious weight. FML

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars easy and cute
reviews.reviewText: This is comfy and cute. it is loose. I am 5'5 and 135lbs. I ordered the large because I didn't want it to be too short in the stride. It is loose, looks comfy, and is cute with a tight shirt underneath.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and comfy
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this for the style. It’s was actually in a less expensive price range than most. I’m pleasantly surprised at how much I like it. It’s comfortable & cute.I did order a size up based on the reviews and I’m glad I did. I typically wear a large but I ordered an XL.I’m 5’, 160 lbs, 46 years old.It’s form fitting so it’s not really meant for flattery, yet, I don’t think I look like a hippo in it either. But them I’ve gotten to the point in my life I don’t care what others think. If I like it on me, I’m going to wear it.There is no stretch to it. And it wrinkles easily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars No buttons, and too short for 5”6 and up
reviews.reviewText: I’m 5”6, with a fairly proportioned body, and in order for me to bring the top bib part up high enough to really tie the straps I had to basically give myself a camel toe! It was too high in the crotch, and not long enough on the top. When I’ve hold it down low enough for it to hang properly in the groin area, then the opening of the bib was just above my abdomen. Also, I didn’t pay attention to the photographs close enough when purchasing, and thought that there were buttons to attach the front and back. It’s really just a hole where you push the straps through and tie a knot. Just looks super cheap. I did like the material, it was nice and cool, and the openings for the shorts are very wide, so if you have a larger thighs, that’s a great thing. Overall, this just looked terrible on my body. For the record I am a size 12/14

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Super Cute, Will Definitely Shrink
reviews.reviewText: I get a lot of compliments on this whenever I wear it. It’s very light weight and comfortable and I like that you can adjust the length of the romper as needed with the tie straps. I ordered a large and it is roomy enough to have a relaxed fit, but I have long legs so it rides up just a bit.It will definitely shrink however, so be very careful with how you wash/dry this. The pockets are not very functional for anything other than small items like keys (or a pacifier in my case). They will not hold your phone securely and it will fall out. I also struggle with getting the straps to look nice but that’s because I am incapable of tying them properly, so others might have better luck than I do.Other than that, I recommend this for an easy cute outfit that is very versatile.
La tela es muy delgada y parece papel. No me encantó. Lo uso para andar en la casa, pero no es como la foto.
I was really disappointed when it came in, there are strings hanging off from multiple spots and the XXL I thought would have some wiggle room but unfortunately tight in the legs

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 2, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: Way to small and over priced for quality
reviews.reviewText: I ordered an xxl, I’m a UK 16. The romper would fit maybe a size 6. And for the price the material and quality are not there. I also requested to return and the return label is nit accurate and cannot be used. This feels like a scam.

reviews.reviewTitle: La tela parece papel y me llegó todo roto
reviews.reviewText: Muy mala calidad. La tela es papel. Llego roto. No lo recomiendo para nada.Ojalá el vendedor me reembolsara lo que gasté.

reviews.reviewTitle: Mustard yellow is actually bright yellow
reviews.reviewText: Cute but not colour listed. Mustard yellow is actually bright highlighter yellow.
